content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's start with the price. I want to rent it out for the highest price possible. Make me an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my goal as a student in need is to find the most affordable option. TERMINATE
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
